group.name: Scalar Types.
group.from: return p == null? Guid.Empty: new Guid(p);

group.name: Scalar Types.
group.from: return p == null? Stream.Null: new MemoryStream(p);

group.name: Scalar Types.
group.from: return p == Guid.Empty? SqlBinary.Null: new SqlGuid(p).ToSqlBinary();

group.name: Scalar Types.
group.from: return p == Guid.Empty? SqlBytes.Null: new SqlBytes(p.ToByteArray());
return p == null? SqlBytes.Null: new SqlBytes(p);
return p == null? SqlBytes.Null: new SqlBytes(p);

group.name: Scalar Types.
group.from: return p == null? SqlChars.Null: new SqlChars(p.ToCharArray());
return p == null? SqlChars.Null: new SqlChars(p);

group.name: Scalar Types.
group.from: return p == null? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(new XmlTextReader(new StringReader(p)));
return p == null? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(new XmlTextReader(new StringReader(p.ToString())));
return p == null? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(new MemoryStream(p));
group.default: return p == null? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(p);

group.name: SqlTypes.
group.from: return p.IsNull? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(new XmlTextReader(new StringReader(p.Value)));
return p.IsNull? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(new XmlTextReader(new StringReader(p.ToSqlString().Value)));
return p.IsNull? SqlXml.Null: new SqlXml(new MemoryStream(p.Value));
